prompt: A whimsical piece of cosmic jewelry made of shimmering star dust and celestial metals, floating gently in the vastness of space. Ethereal light from a nearby nebula casts a soft, rainbow glow over the artifact, highlighting its delicate and intricate design. The backdrop features a field of twinkling stars and distant galaxies, adding a touch of wonder and fantasy to the common but enchanting artifact. Art style: Bright, ethereal visuals with detailed depiction and focus on cosmic elements. Full art with no text.
